      • ElementSprite

        public ElementSprite(String path,
                     int x1,
                     int y1,
                     EntityType type)
        Parameters:
        x1 - the X coordinate of the upper-left corner of the specified rectangular region
        y1 - the Y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the specified rectangular region
        path - equals the path of our pictures.
        type - equals the type of our entities.
